title: So I went on a Hextech Chest opening spree after the receiving the Ocean Week rewards...
body:
Though I said "spree" there were only 3 chests. 

And I got a Tristana champion shard (a champ I own, and is 1350IP anyway), a Shyvana champion shard (another champion I own), and a Temple Jax skin shard (I don't really play Jax). 

Totally worth it. Yay?

> [{quoted}](name=SupportWisp,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=28zYA83k,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-02-06T02:51:34.872+0000)
>
> You got free shit for playing a game you like, how is it not worth it?

Free but not so tasty candies are still not worth it themselves, much like how say a free game is still not worth it if it's hot garbage. Being free doesn't excuse something from disappointment and/or criticism.

When out of 3 rolls, 2 were utterly useless and 1 was just okay, I am allowed to express some disappointment, even if the said rolls in question are 'free' to begin with (it's actually not entirely free, because we're still paying time to get them).

RIP

Yeah you shouldnt really bet on chests to give you good things but sometimes you do get lucky. What matters is making sure you get all your chests (one a week)

Getting things you already own stops me from buying chests whenever I consider it.
I guess that was the entire point?
Slowly collecting key shards and unlocking a chest to receive a champion you already own also sucks pretty hard.
